element.name: Emergency Department Recorded Cause of Injury
element.definition: The documented cause of injury from the emergency department record.
element.v3Comment:
Code list is represented in ICD-10-CM. Reference the NEMSIS Suggested Lists at: http://nemsis.org/v3/resources.html
ICD-10-CM
Website - http://uts.nlm.nih.gov
Product - UMLS Metathesaurus
element.v3Changes: Added to better evaluate EMS care.
